scripts.test: flutter pub get && flutter clean && npm run integration
scripts.rax: mkdir ./integration/.specs/specs/rax && cd ./integration/rax-components && rm -rf ./build && def b && cp -r ./build/* ../../integration/.specs/specs/rax
scripts.delete: cd ./integration/.specs/specs && rm -rf cookie && rm -rf css && rm -rf dom && rm -rf kom && rm -rf kraken && rm -rf url && rm -rf websocket && rm -rf xhr
scripts.integration: npm run clean && npm run compile:ts && npm run rax && npm run delete && node scripts/integration_starter.js
